Uses of Package
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.exceptions

Packages that use de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.exceptions
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.control With the exepction of the GUI class, this package contains all the controlling classes. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.exceptions This package contains all the simulation exceptions 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.externalCommand Classes in this package provide the TCP based interface to control the simulator. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model This package roughly contains all the modelled data objects. 
 

Classes in de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.exceptions used by de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.control
GUINotReadyException
          This exception is thrown when a component tries to issue a command to the GUI, but the GUI has not finished loading a simulation.
 

Classes in de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.exceptions used by de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.exceptions
PlaceNotFoundException
          This exception is thrown when a place is searched by name, and not found.
PositionUnreachableException
          This exception is thrown when pointing the agent to a valid position which the agent can not reach, because there is no path that leads to it.
TrackableNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when an agent or place (i.e. any trackable) that is being searched by name, can not be found.
 

Classes in de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.exceptions used by de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.externalCommand
NothingNearException
          Exception thrown to indicate that there is nothing near the position that has been searched.
TrackableNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when an agent or place (i.e. any trackable) that is being searched by name, can not be found.
UnknownContextException
          This exception is thrown when retrieving a context variable which does not exist.
 

Classes in de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.exceptions used by de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model
AgentNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when an agent that is being searched by name, can not be found.
GUINotReadyException
          This exception is thrown when a component tries to issue a command to the GUI, but the GUI has not finished loading a simulation.
NothingNearException
          Exception thrown to indicate that there is nothing near the position that has been searched.
PlaceNotFoundException
          This exception is thrown when a place is searched by name, and not found.
PlaceTypeUndefinedException
          This exception is thrown when requesting places of a type that does not exist.
PositionOnAWallException
          This exception is thrown when attempting to move the agent on a wall.
PositionOutOfTheMapException
          This exception is thrown when attempting to create a position that is outside the map area.
PositionUnreachableException
          This exception is thrown when pointing the agent to a valid position which the agent can not reach, because there is no path that leads to it.
UnknownContextException
          This exception is thrown when retrieving a context variable which does not exist.
